CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 12 To achieve the solubility and thin film uniformity required in solution processed OPVs and OFETs , NDT1 and NDT3 functionalized with two alkoxy groups were synthesized and applied in semiconductor materials recently ( Figure 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| NDT1 |
| NDT3 |
| semiconductor materials |

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are:

1. NDT1
2. NDT3
3. semiconductor materials

These entities are mentioned as materials in the context of the paragraph. NDT1 and NDT3 are specifically functionalized with two alkoxy groups and used in solution processed OPVs and OFETs. The term "semiconductor materials" is also mentioned as a general category of materials used in the devices.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| NDT1 |
| NDT3 |

In the paragraph, the only clear "Material Name" entities are NDT1 and NDT3. These are the specific materials mentioned in the context of the paragraph, functionalized with two alkoxy groups and used in semiconductor materials.

The term "semiconductor materials" is not a specific material but a general category of materials, and hence it is not included in the table.

Paragraph: 12 To achieve the solubility and thin film uniformity required in solution processed OPVs and OFETs , NDT1 and NDT3 functionalized with two alkoxy groups were synthesized and applied in semiconductor materials recently ( Figure 1 ).

The two "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "solubility" and "thin film uniformity". These are the properties that are being achieved in solution processed OPVs and OFETs by the use of NDT1 and NDT3 functionalized with two alkoxy groups.
